group_1.narration: Some time passed after Hazuki promised@to get info in hopes of clearing our names.
But I haven't heard of any progress@from Hazuki since then...
I don't have any regrets@agreeing to her idea.
But I admit I was starting to feel impatient@because all we could do was wait.
Those feelings might've been what@dragged us into this situation...

group_1.textRight: Hazuki's late again today...

group_1.textLeft: Yes...

group_1.textRight: Is it tough, what she's doing?

group_1.textLeft: I'm sure it's very tough.
But it's not a job that you or I can do, so...
We can only wait for now.

group_1.textRight: Yeah...

group_1.textLeft: Well then, what do you want to have for@lunch?

group_1.textRight: Lunch? Mmn...lemme see, lemme see...
I want BBQ! BBQ!

group_1.textLeft: You really like the BBQ lunch meal, don't@you, Ayame?

group_1.textRight: I LOVE it!
But do you know how much longer we gotta@eat takeout?

group_1.textLeft: That all depends on how Hazuki does.

group_1.narration: Hazuki had always prepared our meals,@but since she was out most of the day,@we had to buy premade stuff instead.
And then, when we were @out to buy lunch one day...

group_1.textLeft: Huh... I've never been to this supermarket.

group_1.textRight: The bentos and bread they sell here are@really good!
But we're here to try and get their special@ice cream! You can only buy it here!
It's amazing right down to the ingredients!@First, the milk comes from those famousâ€”

group_1.textLeft: The curry bread looks sooo good! It says@it's fresh out of the oven!

group_1.textRight: Argh, you're not even listening!

group_1.textLeft: Welcome!

group_1.textRight: Now, what should I get...
Oooh! There's a limited-time-only fried@oyster bento!
It looks super, super good, Konoha!

group_1.textLeft: Huh?
Konoha[chara:100901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...

group_1.textRight: What's wrong, Rena?

group_1.textLeft: Shhh! Be quiet...

group_1.textRight: Do you need to focus that hard? It's just@curry bread you know...

group_1.textLeft: Not that, dummy!

group_1.textRight: Huh? What is it?

group_1.textLeft: Those two girls over there...

group_1.textRight: Mmm...! Too many to choose from! Too many!
So you're not getting the BBQ bento, Ayame?

group_1.textLeft: Ayame[chara:100901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]!
Konoha and Ayame!

group_1.textRight: Konoha and Ayame... Do you mean THAT @Konoha and Ayame? From the rumor?!

group_1.textLeft: I'm gonna go check.
Konoha Shizumi and Ayame Mikuri!

group_1.textRight: ...[chara:302601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]?!
Waaah[chara:302801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]! U-uh, yeah?

group_1.textLeft: Ah hah... It IS you!

group_1.textRight: What...? Wh-who are you?

group_1.textLeft: Rena Minami. And this is Kaede Akino.
We fight in a team with Momoko Togame!

group_1.textRight: Momoko Togame...
Momoko... Wait, didn't that one girl mention@her?!
I seem to recall that, yes.

group_1.textLeft: It's you guys, isn't it!
Hold on, Rena!
What for?!
You're yelling... The staff will get mad...@They're looking at us right now...
Can I borrow you guys a sec?
Let's try this again, starting from the@introductions...
I'm Rena Minami. That's Kaede Akino.
H-hi...
And you guys are that gang everyone's@talking about, huh?
The ones who put Magical Girls to sleep!

group_1.textRight: This again?
That's totally not true, we already said!
R-Rena, please! Yachiyo already told us!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, and?
She might've looked into it, sure, and it's@not like I don't believe her...
But, even so! It feels like something's @still nagging me...
Besides, Momoko got hit too, remember?!
I gotta make sure for myself!

group_1.textRight: But how are you gonna do that...?

group_1.textLeft: Well...
I feel like if we fight, I'll know for sure!@So come at me, you two!

group_1.textRight: Rena!
You're acting kinda like Tsuruno, using@fighting to figure things out...

group_1.textLeft: Sh-shut it! It doesn't matter!
Fighting's just all I could think of!

group_1.textRight: You want to fight us?

group_1.textLeft: I don't care which one of you it is! I just@gotta do it.

group_1.textRight: You're not going to let this go unless we@agree, are you?

group_1.textLeft: Y-you got that right!

group_1.textRight: You're on! If ya wanna fight, I'm ready@to go!
No. I'll fight you.
What?![chara:302801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock] C'mon! I'll do it!
Leave this to me. You just stay back.
Ugh... All right.
(Things are only getting worse...)
(I wonder if this is part of someone's scheme@as well?)
(And there's still that vision I saw...)
(I won't let Ayame get hurt. I absolutely@will not let that happen!)

group_1.textLeft: So you're gonna fight me, huh... @Well, here I come!

group_1.textRight: Ready and waiting.
You'll quiet down after I'm done with you!
